# Checkbox Toggle Release Notes

<!-- ## [Unreleased] -->

## 2.10.0

### Changed

- For touch devices:
  - Change `font-size` of label text to `$font-size-5` (1rem)
  - Increase `font-size` of `.slds-checkbox_faux_container` to `$font-size-2` (0.75rem)

<!-- ## [VERSION] -->
